actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of Fenton Art Glass, a beloved institution in West Virginia,  that continues to contribute to the economic and cultural heritage of the State through its production of world renowned, hand-blown glass.

summary.text:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Congratulates Fenton Art Glass on its centennial milestone, for creating beautiful, hand-blown glass in West Virginia for 100 years.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of Fenton Art Glass, a beloved institution in West Virginia,  that continues to contribute to the economic and cultural heritage of the State through its production of world renowned, hand-blown glass.
